-- ShipperUpdate -- 2014/07/03 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Shippers] SET
[ShipperID] = @Set_ShipperID_forUPD, [CompanyName] = @Set_CompanyName_forUPD, [Phone] = @Set_Phone_forUPD,
WHERE
AND [ShipperID] = @ShipperIDAND [ShipperID] IS NULL
AND [CompanyName] = @CompanyNameAND [CompanyName] IS NULL
AND [Phone] = @PhoneAND [Phone] IS NULL
